original: Bökman, Karl Rudolf, direktör, Göteborg, f. 10/5/95 i Gbg av stadsmäkl. Sven B. o. Laura Rasch. G. 33 m. Elsa Lindberg. — Prakt, å skepps-mäkl :kont. i Gbg, London o. New York 14-21, avd:chef h. Aug. Bolten i Hamburg 21-28, dir. i A-B Kreuger & Toll i Amsterdam 29-31, verkst. dir. i Rederi A-B Sv. Lloyd sed. 31. V. ordf. i styr. f. Nora Bergslags Järnv. A-B, led. av styr. f. Försäkr. A-B At-lantica, Eriksbergs Mek. Verkst. A-B, v. ordf. i styr. f. Sv:es redarefören. o. Färg A-B International, led. av styr. f. Gbgs Bogser o. Bärgn. A-B, Bärgn. o. Dykeri A-B Neptun, Grand Hotel i Gbg o. Sv:es ångfart. asis:fören., led. av Lloyds registers sv. komm., Jed. av styr. f. SILA, ordf. i styr. f. Skand. Aero A-B. RNO, RVO, KltKrO, KNS :tOO.
translated: Bökman, Karl Rudolf, director, Gothenburg, born May 10, 1895 in Gothenburg to city broker Sven B. and Laura Rasch. Married in 1933 to Elsa Lindberg. Worked as a shipping broker in Gothenburg, London, and New York from 1914 to 1921. Was department manager for Aug. Bolten in Hamburg from 1921 to 1928, director of A-B Kreuger & Toll in Amsterdam from 1929 to 1931, and executive director of Rederi A-B Sv. Lloyd from 1931 onwards. He was vice-chairman of the board of Nora Bergslags Järnväg A-B, board member of Försäkr. A-B At-lantica, Eriksbergs Mek. Verkst. A-B, vice-chairman of the board of the Swedish Shipowners' Association and Färg A-B International, board member of Gbgs Bogser and Bärgn. A-B, Bärgn. and Dykeri A-B Neptun, the Grand Hotel in Gothenburg and the Swedish Steamship Association, board member of Lloyd's Register Swedish Committee, head of the board of SILA, chairman of the board of Scandinavian Aero A-B. Decorated with RNO, RVO, KltKrO, KNS: tOO. "m. partners name" means that the person married in the year 19xx.
